issue.title: [MATLAB] Migrate the MEX gateway function to use the C++ MATLAB Data Array (MDA) API, instead of C Matrix API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13057](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13057). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current MEX gateway function uses the [C Matrix API\|[https://www.mathworks.com/help/matlab/cc-mx-matrix-library.html?s_tid=CRUX_lftnav]]

We should update to use the latest C++ MATLAB Data Array API, to gain access to modern C++ features and memory management.
